Class GridNearTxLocal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.util.lang.GridMetadataAwareAdapter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, IgniteInternalTx, IgniteTxLocalEx, GridTimeoutObject

    public class GridNearTxLocal
extends GridDhtTxLocalAdapter
implements GridTimeoutObject, AutoCloseable
    Replicated user transaction.

                       String lb)

        implicit - Implicit flag.

        sys - System flag.
        plc - IO policy.
        concurrency - Concurrency.
        isolation - Isolation.
        timeout - Timeout.
        storeEnabled - Store enabled flag.
        txSize - Transaction size.
        subjId - Subject ID.
        taskNameHash - Task name hash code.
        lb - Label.

      • loadMissing

        public IgniteInternalFuture<Void> loadMissing(GridCacheContext cacheCtx,
                                              AffinityTopologyVersion topVer,
                                              boolean readThrough,
                                              boolean async,
                                              Collection<KeyCacheObject> keys,
                                              boolean skipVals,
                                              boolean needVer,
                                              boolean keepBinary,
                                              boolean recovery,
                                              javax.cache.expiry.ExpiryPolicy expiryPlc,
                                              GridInClosure3<KeyCacheObject,Object,GridCacheVersion> c)
        Parameters:
        cacheCtx - Cache context.
        readThrough - Read through flag.
        async - if True, then loading will happen in a separate thread.
        keys - Keys.
        skipVals - Skip values flag.
        needVer - If true version is required for loaded values.
        c - Closure to be applied for loaded values.
        expiryPlc - Expiry policy.
        Returns:
        Future with True value if loading took place.

        public void suspend()
             throws IgniteCheckedException
        Suspends transaction. It could be resumed later. Supported only for optimistic transactions.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If the transaction is in an incorrect state, or timed out.

        Specified by:
        localFinish in interface IgniteTxLocalEx
        Overrides:
        localFinish in class GridDhtTxLocalAdapter

      • rollbackNearTxLocalAsync

        public IgniteInternalFuture<IgniteInternalTx> rollbackNearTxLocalAsync(boolean clearThreadMap,
                                                                       boolean onTimeout)
        Parameters:
        clearThreadMap - True if needed to clear thread map.
        onTimeout - True if called from timeout handler. Note: For async rollbacks (from timeouts or another thread) should not clear thread map since thread started tx still should be able to see this tx to prevent subsequent operations.
        Returns:
        Rollback future.
